ability.Gourd Resilience: Reduces damage from all types of moves by 25% if the user's HP is above 50%.
ability.Enduring Energy: Restores 1/16 of its maximum HP if it uses a Grass-type move during Hail or Snow.

Verdant Goad.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Metallic Rampart.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage and reflects 25% of the physical damage taken this turn back to the attacker.

Bovine Crush.effect: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.
